title: Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition (Switch 2) |OT| Night City in your Silverhands (Reviews Threadmarked) Nintendo - OT | ResetEra
text: MOD EDIT: Since the Switch 2 version of Cyberpunk 2077 is a new release for a new console and it's been long enough since the initial release, we've allowed a new OT for it to be created. Any and all discussion about the Switch 2 version goes in here. Due to transphobia and concerns around epileptic triggers, any and all conversation about the other versions still goes in the game's OT in hangouts. Want to know more? See here Thread Title by Primal Sage View: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fAbW5AY7C68 View: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7H3xbsFPoZA View: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g42TZdesZvY Due to transphobia and concerns around epileptic triggers, any and all conversation about the other versions still goes in the game's OT in hangouts. Want to know more?
